mapper.select: SELECT gcode, gname, ginfo, gprice, gsale, gdate, cate1, cate2, regdate, editdate FROM goods WHERE goodsno=#{goodsno}
SELECT gcode, gname, ginfo, gprice, gsale, gdate, cate1, cate2, regdate, editdate FROM goods
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods(gcode, gname, ginfo, gprice, gsale, gdate, cate1, cate2, regdate, editdate) VALUES (#{gcode}, #{gname}, #{ginfo}, #{gprice}, #{gsale}, #{gdate}, #{cate1}, #{cate2}, #{regdate}, #{editdate});
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET gcode = #{gcode}, gname = #{gname}, ginfo = #{ginfo}, gprice = #{gprice}, gsale = #{gsale}, gdate = #{gdate}, cate1 = #{cate1}, cate2 = #{cate2}, editdate = #{editdate} WHERE goodsno = #{goodsno}
